description:
For women who log serious distance in mountainous terrain. Designed by the women’s team at Ultimate Direction, this high-capacity running vest carries energy bars, water, spare layers and even trekking poles and an ice axe. The pockets and bottle are placed up front for mid-run refueling, and the vest design rides high so it doesn’t interfere with your stride.

  • Made of light, strong 20-denier nylon with breathable mesh in areas that touch your body
  • Comfort Cinch 2.0 adjustment lets you adjust the fit though the lower back
  • Sliding sternum straps are easy to adjust with one hand
  • Front pocket for the 500ml Body Bottle™ and a zippered burrito pocket
  • Zig zag bungees on the back hold your rain shell
  • Pockets for GPS locator devices
  • Zippered and phone-sized pockets offer plenty of storage
  • Integrated rain fly included for unpredictable weather
  • Back sleeve accommodates up to a 2L water bladder (sold separately)
  • How to measure: circumference at the bottom of your rib cage
  • Recommended size: S for 58-81cm; M for 76-99cm; L for 98-117cm
name: Ultimate Direction Adventure Vesta 5.0 - Women's
